mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( productNum, productName, cityName, DepartureTime, productPrice, productDesc, productStatus )VALUES( #{productNum}, #{productName}, #{cityName}, #{DepartureTime}, #{productPrice}, #{productDesc}, #{productStatus} );
mapper.update: UPDATE product p SET p.productName = #{productName}, p.cityName = #{cityName}, p.DepartureTime = #{DepartureTime}, p.productPrice = #{productPrice}, p.productDesc = #{productDesc}, p.productStatus = #{productStatus} WHERE p.id =#{id}
